issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h2. Problem

The dialog_test.js app is found here: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_blackberry/blob/master/test/apps/native/tibbtest/Resources/dialog_test.js

It is currently littered with unescaped special characters, the indention is erratic, and it has elements in it that are not Javascript code. It appears that this code was copied from a chat client of some kind and committed into the list of test apps without testing. The content of this sample should be cleaned up so that it can be executed properly.

h2. Pull Request

https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_blackberry/pull/27

comments.body:
Verified the fix. Thus closing.

Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.1.201306112235
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.2.v20130726192706
